channel.title: TeleBlock
channel.description: How would i make it so if you became teleblocked you can not log out and in to remove it.

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

into the character fileâ€¦ i want to be able to tb them ingame and make it basically perm unless i do like ::unjail which removes the telblock

but w\e right now im trying to add teleblocks to like a varrock tele spell but its not working. Says person is tbed but still teles him heeres my command

if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("YOUR TBED DON'T EVEN TRY"); } else stillgfx(308, absY, absX); setAnimation(714); if (playerLevel[6] >= 25) actionTimer = 10; teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; addSkillXP((48*playerLevel[6]), 6); break;

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Search
case 9154 (or logout, Im not sure if 9154 is the right one)

Once you have found the place that has to do with logging out put something like

if(teleblock = true) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked and cannot log out!"); }

I have never tried this out, but see if it works!

Read full topic
